Class CommandControllerTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.view.CommandControllerTest

  • public class CommandControllerTest
extends java.lang.Object
    View's Test Class: Command Controller test the correct functioning of restriction methods related to die placement
    Author:
    Davide Gioiosa

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkMoveValidity_negativeResultAdjacentColourRestriction()
      Check that after the first placement of a die, the die is placed adjacent at least near one, respecting adj Colour Restriction, incorrect player Move
      void checkMoveValidity_negativeResultAdjacentValueRestriction()
      Check that after the first placement of a die, the die is placed adjacent at least near one, respecting adj Value Restriction, correct player Move
      void checkMoveValidity_negativeResultColourRestriction()
      Check that if there is a Colour limitation on the cell, the die is the right colour requested, correct player Move
      void checkMoveValidity_negativeResultIsAdjacent()
      Check that after the first placement of a die, the die is placed adjacent at least near one, correct player Move
      void checkMoveValidity_negativeResultIsOnTheBorderCheck()
      Check that first placement of a die is on the border, correct player Move
      void checkMoveValidity_negativeResultValueRestriction()
      Check that if there is a Value limitation on the cell, the die is the right value requested, incorrect player Move
